resources.string: Select apps recommended by your service provider.
All of your selected apps have been downloaded.
Select apps recommended by your service provider.
Select the apps you want to install.
"After downloading, restart your phone to install the update. You won't be able to use your phone, even to make emergency calls, until the installation is complete."
After the update, some settings may be reset to their default values.
Downloading using mobile data may result in additional charges.
To use the latest features, download and install this firmware update.
Tap here to select recommended apps for download.
Tap here to download and install the update.
This update includes some optional apps and content. Downloading via mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
Your critical software update has been downloaded. Your device will restart in %d seconds to begin installation.
You need to be connected to a Wi-Fi network to download apps. Connect to a Wi-Fi network and try again.
Network not available. Try again later.
Available apps released from your service provider will be shown here.
To finish installing your service provider software update, you need to restart your phone.
To finish installing your service provider software update, you need to restart your tablet.
No data charges apply for downloading the apps below.
Tap on an item below to learn more about it.
Apps will be downloaded over Wi-Fi.
Downloading using mobile data may result in additional charges.
Your phone will restart after the update is installed.
Download and install the latest software from your service provider.

"- You will not be charged for this firmware installation.
- During installation, you will not be able to use your device at all, even for emergency calls.
- Icons on the home screen and device settings may be reset to their defaults and may need to be reconfigured after installation.
- A firmware update should not affect the files and data on your device.
- However, if you stop the installation process before it has finished, your device might not work normally and your files may be lost as a result.
- To avoid unexpected data loss, we recommend that you back up important data before installation."
Restart phone to finish installing your service provider software update.
"App installation paused. Waiting for "Wi-Fi to install apps.
Install apps recommended by your service provider.
The latest updates have already been installed.
